topic.title: <MultilineTextBox>
topic.p: <MultilineTextBox/> is a GuiScrollView. The control template doesn't need to care about rendering characters. When it is installed to the control, a fully managed GuiColorizedTextElement will be installed to the ContainerComposition of the control template.
<CommonScrollViewLook/> is very useful to implement the control template.
<MultilineTextBox/> provides both horizontal and vertical scroll bars.
